comment.author: 33472394@N00
comment._content:
This is actually the intersection of Broadway and De Kalb in Brooklyn, looking southeast. Broadway runs parallel to Bushwick and has the elevated train tracks. If you look at the street sign on the left of the image, you can see the letters "DEK," and De Kalb is the best match I can find. 

The building marked "Food Center" is still standing and has a grocery store.

comment.author: 25088790@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/dendroica] You're right. The Food Center sign, on the bottom red stripe reads "Broadway and Dekalb Food Center."
